it.fmuia.apps.tapatalkapi
Class UserService

java.lang.Object
  it.fmuia.apps.tapatalkapi.TapatalkBaseService
      it.fmuia.apps.tapatalkapi.UserService

public class UserService
extends TapatalkBaseService

This section provides necessary functions related to user such as authentication, user profile and other user specific actions.

Author:
muia

searchUser

public List<User> searchUser(String keywords)
Return a list of users by giving key word. Flag 'search_user' returned in get_config will indicate the plugin support this function.

Parameters:
keywords - using * from partial search
Returns:

getRecommendedUser

public RecommendedUsers getRecommendedUser(UserType mode)
                                    throws TapatalkApiException
Return a list of recommended users for conversation or pm. Flag 'user_recommended' returned in get_config will indicate the plugin support this function. It will return 20 users at default without any

Parameters:
mode -
Returns:
Throws:
TapatalkApiException

getRecommendedUser

public RecommendedUsers getRecommendedUser(int page,
                                           int numberOfResults,
                                           UserType mode)
                                    throws TapatalkApiException
Return a list of recommended users for conversation or pm. Flag 'user_recommended' returned in get_config will indicate the plugin support this function. It will return 20 users at default without any parameter.

                                 String userId)

getInboxStat

public InboxStat getInboxStat()
                       throws TapatalkApiException

login

public User login(String loginName,
                  String password)
           throws LoginException,
                  TapatalkApiException
Server returns cookies in HTTP header. Client should store the cookies and pass it back to server for all subsequence calls to maintain user session. ** DO NOT include HTTP Cookies in the request header

Returns:

getAvatar

public BufferedImage getAvatar(String userId,
                               String username)
                        throws UnsupportedFunction
This script allows the app to pass the user id or based64 encoded username and it returns the user's avatar as an image. Return a 1x1 image if this user has no avatar.

Parameters:
userId -
username -
Returns:
Throws:
UnsupportedFunction
